member.name: WICPngFilterOption
member.summary: Specifies the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) filters available for compression optimization.

member.name: WICPngFilterOption.WICPngFilterUnspecified
member.summary: Indicates an unspecified PNG filter. This enables WIC to algorithmically choose the best filtering option for the image.

member.name: WICPngFilterOption.WICPngFilterAdaptive
member.summary: Indicates a PNG adaptive filter. This enables WIC to choose the best filtering mode on a per-scanline basis.
